content:
Next time, next time...
Yeah! There will definitely be a next time!

content:
In the Lobster Gate's dining hall, there hangs a huge piece of calligraphy,
with four bold characters that read "Nothing Goes to Waste"!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
I took your advice
and made all the preparations!
Just waiting to show what I can do on set—

content:
{短暂停}Hmm! You're right!
Come on, Manna, cheer up!

content:
Before I left home, I made a promise with my old man:
If I grow to be two meters tall and still haven't achieved my dream,
I'll have to go back home and take over the family business no matter what.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content: Next time it'll be for real.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-11蛮蛮_选项闲聊

content:
Thank you, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
If it weren't for you, I would have forgotten my original aspirations.

content: Looking at it now, I still have quite a ways to go before I reach two meters tall!

content:
I don't quite understand why they'd hang these words in the cafeteria,
but this saying works well anywhere!
I should remember it too!

content:
I set my goal to become an action movie star
And it's been one-two-three-four-five-six-seven years!
What's so scary about waiting for another "next time"!

content:
<size=64>"This Balloon Needs More Air"!</size>
Do you remember the name of that movie?

content:
"This Balloon Needs More Air"
It doesn't exist at all, uwaaah—

content:
I received an invitation to this movie screening earlier...
Through a crack in the door!
Just like those creepy stories you hear on late-night radio!

content: Hard work never goes to waste.

content:
But, but! When I looked at that invitation again,
I found a clown mark—
So this was actually just a prank...

content:
There's plenty of time!
Keep it up, Manna!
<size=64>Hoo-yah!</size>
